title: Gold 5 team LFM
body:
Gold 5 ranked team LFM
My ign is Demonsiayer and I am looking for a top laner/jungler /adc to join my team. The team is currently Gold 5 in ranking but its highest was gold 1. I am looking for players who are gold + in rank. Looking for players that have the goal in doing their best as well as making good friends. I don’t believe in having a 100% serious team because it just kills the fun of playing League of Legends. 
While when we ranked 5 we are very serious, there is nothing wrong with socialising a bit before we play and even after we finish. Meaning, I will be organising customs and hope to really strengthen the bond between the players. I am a very experienced captain and I love meeting new people! 
Just to make the point clear! I am looking for players who want to improve and be serious in ranked 5, as well as make good friends! Players must have mics and be able to talk! 

Add me =)

replies.body:
IGN: Leviathan
Rank: plat 1
Role: Adc/mid
XP In 5's: Alot of casual, nothing serious
Main champs: Vayne, jinx, ez Mid: ahri, lux, vel
Avalibility: Just about every day

silver 1 going on gold, gold 3 last season. top laner and always keen
ign Vitrolix
Added you, Gold 3 player. 5's team got gold 5 last season but stopped once got gold in 5's. Keen to get into 5's again as one left to Japan so, we are short on our team.
All to easy buddy! We can also organize to combine teams if you have the numbers =)
